content: it s fun to just sit down and knit a project without a pattern or plan this hat was made using whatever stitch or stitch combination that popped into my head lots of texture using simple knit and purl stitches the hat is knit in the round from the bottom up you ll need a circular needle plus a set of double pointed needles for the top of the hat or the decrease method of your choosing easy for any experience level i made the samples using worsted weight 100% superwash wool because they will be sent to the hats for sailors project
